Hotel.name: Hotel De La Paix, A Ritz-Carlton Partner Hotel

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel De La Paix, you'll be centrally located in Geneva, steps from Sisi Monument and minutes from Mont Blanc Bridge. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of The Library In English and Rousseau Island.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 84 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Geneva? This hotel has 2636 square feet (245 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Enjoy recreational amenities such as a fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 84 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hotel De La Paix, you'll be centrally located in Geneva, steps from Sisi Monument and minutes from Mont Blanc Bridge. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of The Library In English and Rousseau Island.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sisi Monument - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Mont Blanc Bridge - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Library In English - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Rousseau Island - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Flower Clock - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
English Garden Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Notre Dame Basilica - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Paquis Baths - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Anglais Garden - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Barbier-Mueller Archeology Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Jet d'Eau Fountain - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
International Museum of the Reformation - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tavel House History Museum - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel De La Paix is Geneva International Airport (GVA) - 4 km / 2.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel De La Paix is Geneva (GVA-Cointrin Intl.) - 4 km / 2.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

RoomType.text: Twin (Ritz-Carlton Suite 1 Bedroom Suite 1 King Lakefront)

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel. Extra Bed Policy: Additional charges may apply. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
